name: Fast For Life Demo
description:
Fast For Life is a racing game with an open world and races. you can choose 23 cars (after you baught them).  You can be the best Racer of the city or the worst driver.  If a race is lost you cant restart them.  Now go for a drive and be the best (or worst) !!

Or enjoy the sound track and drive like you wont.

If you have a bug please inform me in the comments or on my email: onixathgames@gmail.com
